article_title: Google debuts 'Works With Chromebook' badge for accessories
article_description: If you ve ever bought a cable  a charger or any other accessory that ended up incompatible with the device it s meant for  you ll likely appreciate Google s latest   Works With   badge  The tech giant has debuted the  Works With Chromebook  logo  which can gi
article_content: Google says all accessories with the badge have been tested and are guaranteed to comply with Chromebook s compatibility standards  Thus far  the company has certified products from several famous brands  including Anker  Kensington and Logitech  Also  certif   223 chars
